messages.content:
generate all possible 14 character alphabetic strings and compare them to the list of words here: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dwyl/english-words/refs/heads/master/uk-us-dict.txt
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

automatically create the guesses without requiring user input. Display all dictionary matches.
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
